title: Interpretation of eating grapes in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Eating grapes in a dream. Grapes are delicious and tasty fruits that everyone loves to eat. They are distinguished by their different colors and wonderful taste. For this vision. Eating grapes in a dream. If the dreamer sees him eating grapes in a dream, this means comfort, a stable life, and the arrival of good news for him. And in the event that the dreamer sees grapes in If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is eating red grapes, this symbolizes him gaining a living, but it was not enough for his needs. Ibn Shaheen believes that seeing grape juice for the dreamer In a dream, it indicates that she is exposed to some problems in her life and many worries in her life. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is eating grapes out of season, this will lead to distress and exposure to problems and disasters during this period. Al-Nabulsi confirms that seeing the dreamer in a dream eating grapes heralds abundance of livelihood and opens It has the doors to happiness. If a girl sees bunches of grapes on trees in a dream, this promises her that she will achieve the goals and successes that she will achieve. And the dreamer eating grapes from the bunch in a dream indicates that he will be exposed to many problems and worries. As for seeing a married man eating grape leaves in a dream, this means It indicates separation and many problems with his wife. Eating grapes in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says that seeing the dreamer eating grapes in a dream indicates abundant nutrition and the succession of many blessings to him. But if a single man sees in a dream that he is eating fresh grapes, he will be happy to announce that he will get married. Soon a good girl will change for the better. If a married man sees in a dream that he is eating grapes, this indicates the strength of the relationship between him and his wife, which is based on understanding and psychological comfort. Also, the dreamer who sees grapes and eats them in a dream shows good generosity and that he always tries to provide help. To others. If a sick person sees grapes in a dream, this means that his recovery time is near and God will bless him with good health. Anxious or in debt, if he dreams of squeezing grapes, this symbolizes that he does a lot of false things in life, but he will repent of them. As for seeing juice Grapes in a dream, it means solving a lot of problems, fixing the situation, and making a lot of profits. What is the interpretation of eating grapes in a dream for a single woman? If an unmarried girl dreams that she is eating grapes, this foretells her a very good and abundant diet that she will earn because of her skills and efforts to reach her goal. If the dreamer sees white grapes, this indicates his closeness to a good, just and suitable person for her. If the fortuneteller sees eating grapes out of season, this means that you will achieve your ambitions and goals and enjoy comfort soon. What is the interpretation of seeing bunches of grapes in a dream for a single woman? Interpretation scholars believe that A single girl who sees bunches of grapes in a dream leads to problems and fears in her life, but they will inevitably end. If the dreamer sees a bunch of grapes on a tree in a dream, this indicates the fulfillment of desires and goals.

title: Interpretation of seeing a red rose in a dream and its effects

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a red rose in a dream. It is worth noting that this vision is considered one of the visions that many people may have, which includes many different interpretations and interpretations from one god to another. The difference in interpretations is based on the details that the person sees and based on the social status of the person who sees it. He sees a dream, and many interpreters have worked hard to clarify the meanings included in this vision, and along these lines we will explain to you the interpretation of seeing a red rose in a dream.Interpretation of seeing a red rose in a dreamIn general, lipstick is a sign of movement, and change in life is important, Moreover, it is moving to a new home or a new marriage, and it also includes many different interpretations, and along these lines we will explain the interpretation of seeing a red rose in a dream. It is also: in the event that lipstick appears in a dream. It is evidence of solving problems and removing anxiety and indicates An approach of comfort and a feeling of happiness. If a woman sees herself wearing professional lipstick in a dream. This is evidence that this woman has a good attitude and sobriety in solving the problems she suffers from in her life. If a single man sees a beautiful woman wearing lipstick. This dream is evidence that she She will get married soon. Whereas if a married man dreams of a beautiful woman wearing lipstick. This is evidence that his life will improve, and he will be better in the next period of his life. See also: Interpretation of a dream of watching television for a single and married woman in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing lipstick in a dream for a man. This The interpretations that contain these visions differ from each other, and in dream interpretation books, many explain the interpretation of these visions, some of which are positive, good and good, and some of which have negative and not good connotations, and in this context we will learn more about the interpretation of seeing lipstick in a dream for a man, which is as follows: If someone sees in a dream that he is bringing lipstick to his wife. It is a sign that pregnancy is imminent for this woman. According to what the dream interpreters said, red lipstick in a dream is for an unmarried man. The extra burden is a sign and evidence of approaching marriage. In addition In addition, if a man sees a luxurious blush in a dream. It is testimony to many happy news that come the man’s way. See also: Playing the flute in a dream by Ibn Sirin in detail for unmarried women. Interpretation of dreams of wearing red lipstick for single women. In a single girl’s dream, it includes This dream has many different interpretations and interpretations, which are mostly promising and evidence of goodness and happiness for those who see the dream, and along these lines we will learn more about it. Interpretation of dreams about wearing red lipstick for single women is also: Some dream interpreters saw this vision in the dream of an unmarried girl. It is an indication that she will enter into a romantic love story, which will lead to an engagement very soon. The engaged girl is wearing lipstick. This is evidence that she will get married

title: Interpretation of leg hair in a dream for single, pregnant and married women

preview.html: Learn about the interpretation of leg hair in a dream from Ibn Sirin. Dreams represent a set of visible events and situations that a person experiences at night during sleep, which, although illogical and unrelated to reality, are very logical when seen in a dream. It has been proven since ancient times that dreams are merely a mirror of reality that reflects to people some symbols And the signs that they predicted may happen to them in the future, so many people look for interpretations of their dreams as soon as they wake up. From sleep and to learn about the interpretation of seeing leg hair in a dream, follow us in the encyclopedia article below. Interpretation of leg hair in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin explained that seeing leg hair in a dream is one of the things whose interpretation varies depending on the condition that the dreamer saw in his dream and the damage. While seeing hair His legs falling from his body indicate that he is free of worries and that problems, hardships and pain will go away from him. Seeing thick body hair for merchants and business owners in general indicates that it is an increase in sustenance and a very legitimate good that he will gain from his work, God willing. Whoever gets married and sees that the hair on his legs or body comes out and appears. From him, this indicates that he heard good news of his wife’s pregnancy soon, and God knows best. Seeing a woman removing her leg hair and shaving it indicates that God Almighty will comfort her, improve her conditions, and remove her worries and problems from her life. Whoever sees in his dream that his body or legs are white hair, that he is in debt. For others, this indicates that he will be able to pay off his debts and return the rights to their owners soon, God willing. And whoever is sad and in pain and sees in his dream that he was removing the hair from his legs and shaving it, then this is a good vision that portends that worries, problems, diseases, and obstacles will soon disappear from his life. Also, hair removal represents... The dream is generally a dreamer who spends his money on successful business projects that bring him good and abundant profit. Plucking leg hair in a dream. If a person sees in a dream that he is plucking his coarse hair, then this dream indicates his salvation from his troubles and the achievement of joy and happiness in his coming days. There are scholars who interpreted this vision according to It is an indication that the dreamer is under severe pressure as a result of the accumulation of debts on him. Interpretation of seeing leg hair in a dream for a single woman: Seeing leg hair is one of the unpleasant visions in an unmarried woman’s dream, which indicates the bad psychological state that the viewer suffers from due to the pressures and problems he is exposed to during This period. Also, if he sees thick hair on the legs of an unmarried woman, this indicates many problems, worries, and responsibilities that fall on his shoulders during this period. However, if an unmarried woman sees the hair on her legs so thin that it is difficult to see, this indicates that she will be exposed to a superficial or emergency situation. A simple problem, and God knows best. Seeing an unmarried woman shaving or removing her leg hair is a praiseworthy vision that expresses her ability to overcome obstacles and restore balance in her life soon, God willing. This vision may indicate that God Almighty will soon bless the dreamer by marrying a religious man of good faith. Good manners, if necessary

title: Interpretation of a dream about eating chocolate for a single woman according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of a single woman’s dream of eating chocolate? Interpretation of a single woman’s dream of eating chocolate in a dream. All modern jurists have spoken about it, because at the time when the great dream interpreters, such as Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi, wrote their books on dream interpretation, chocolate had not been invented and therefore had not been invented. They talk about it. In particular. You have a dream that confuses you. You are waiting for it.. Google, an Egyptian site for dream interpretation. Interpretation of a dream about eating chocolate for a single woman. Eating chocolate in a dream for a single woman indicates happiness, especially if it tastes good and is more beautiful than the reality. Obtaining a piece of chocolate from a person with whom he had quarreled in The past is evidence of reconciliation between them. The dreamer took chocolate from a stranger in a dream, evidence of a lot of nourishment from where she does not know. When chocolate finds her lover or fiancé in a dream, he is faithful and faithful to her, and does not engage in behaviors that cause her distress, and gives her support and strength and supports her In difficulties. If he sees that he is eating more delicious pieces of chocolate, this is a good sign, and it means intelligence and good handling of situations with wisdom and logic. When she sees that she divided the chocolate into two parts and gave her friend part of it, this is a sign of their love for each other and their relationship will increase with time. If The unmarried woman had eaten a delicious piece of chocolate in her dream, knowing that she is not emotionally stable. In reality, the dream indicates a new love relationship that adds joy and positive energy to her life. This symbol in her dream indicates her recovery from an incurable disease and from now on her outlook will change. For life and you will see it from a positive and optimistic point of view. When she is struggling financially in her life and finds herself eating a large piece of chocolate, it is money that removes hardship and suffering and brings prosperity and material comfort to her life. If the color of the chocolate is black, this is anxiety and fears that will disappear from her life forever. But if the color of the chocolate is white, she will receive a golden offer from a young man who wants to marry her, and the lawyers said that this opportunity will not be compensated again in her life, and if she takes advantage of it and decides to do so, Marrying him, happiness will be on her part. Interpretation of a dream about eating chocolate for a single woman by Ibn Sirin, since Ibn Sirin did not talk about the symbol of chocolate specifically, but rather talked about sweets in general, and said that when a girl eats sweets and feels its delicious taste, she succeeds, achieves her goals, and feels With the greatest value in life. Candy is a symbol of the dreamer’s acceptance by others, or in a clearer sense that she is a beloved girl, her reputation is fragrant, and people have praised her for her good morals, purity of heart, and upright behavior. If she dreams of someone she should do by giving her a piece of chocolate Or candy in waking life. He loves her very much, but he did not talk to her about his feelings, and he may take this positive step soon to reveal to her the positive feelings he feels towards her. Candy in a girl’s dream indicates joy and the return of positive energy.

title: Interpretation of laughing in a dream and smiling in a dream

preview.html: Seeing the laughter of an unmarried, married, or pregnant woman, whether a child laughing, an infant, or a dead person. I dreamed of someone you love smiling, whether I know him or not, according to Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of laughter in a dream by Al-Nabulsi. Laughter in a dream indicates joy and happiness if he is not laughing. If the laughter in the dream is intense, even if he is lying on his back, then it indicates its opposite or opposite, and this means crying or sadness. Al-Nabulsi adds in his book (The Smell of Creatures in Expressing a Dream): If the laughter is in jest, sarcasm, mockery, or contempt. In the dream, it indicates the lack of chivalry of the dreamer or the joker in waking life. As was said in the interpretation of a dream about laughter, laughing with imitation or imitation indicates falling into what is forbidden or forbidden. As for someone who dreams of laughing quietly without making an annoying sound like laughter, this portends a happy event. If he marries or his wife becomes pregnant, the good news will be a son, God willing. Interpretation of laughter in a dream: Laughter is loud and annoying at times, and it usually occurs among a group of people as a result of jokes, jokes, or humor. Whoever sees in a dream that his laugh is a soft or soft smile, this is a sign of integrity. Man is in his religion and in his world. Al-Nabulsi says: Whoever sees in his dream that the earth is laughing, this is a sign of fertility in that place or place. As for the dead person who laughs or smiles in a dream, he is in the abode of bliss, and such visions express a praiseworthy consequence for the pious dead person. And the righteous. Laughter in a dream, if it is caused by belittlement, sarcasm, or frivolity, is a bad sign, especially for those with status, money, or power, because it represents the exclusion, removal, or death of their blessings. Aristotle said: We laugh at those who are less than us and at those who are ugly, because there is joy that comes to us when we feel that we are luckier than them. Someone is smiling at me in a dream. Seeing a smile or smiling in a dream symbolizes joy, pleasure, or hearing happy news. The best vision is to see the smile of a newborn baby. Because it symbolizes blessings and good luck for whoever sees it in his dream. Seeing a smile is better than seeing laughter, and seeing a smile in the gaps (pinch the cheeks) portends nourishment. If a fortuneteller sees someone smiling at him, whether that person knows him or not, it means that the fortuneteller will meet Seeing a smile from someone you know is good and symbolizes that the dreamer will have a source of livelihood. Seeing the smile of a stranger in a dream indicates that the dreamer is traveling. Seeing the smile of a dead person in a dream indicates a reassured soul submissive to its Lord. It can symbolize continuous prayer. Or charity. If an unmarried or unmarried girl sees a man smiling at her in a dream, this portends marriage and wealth for him, if this man is a stranger to her. As for a married woman, she sees the smile of a man she knows or her husband’s smile at her. This portends that she will become pregnant soon, and this may indicate livelihood and money. If a pregnant woman sees in her dream a man she knows or her husband smiling at her in the dream, this foretells that she will give birth to a boy, even if that is in the first months. And from the meat

title: Interpretation of a dream about cleaning strawberries in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of cleaning strawberries in a dream We will explain what scholars have applied regarding the interpretation of the dream of cleaning strawberries in a dream and what it means in reality. All this and more details that interest you.Interpretation of the dream of cleaning strawberries in a dreamInterpretation of the dream of cleaning strawberries in a dream Seeing strawberries clean can mean good things with permission God knows where seeing fake strawberries may represent recovery from illness, and God knows the unseen. And if the dreamer sees fake strawberries, this may indicate goodness and happiness, and God knows best. When a married woman sees clean strawberries, it may indicate goodness and good fortune, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about buying guava in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about buying guava. In a dream, it can be a sign of positive changes, God willing. When the dreamer sees himself buying guava, he may express his satisfaction, and God knows best. If a married woman is seen buying guava, it may be a sign that she will be freed from anxiety, and God knows the unseen. A vision of buying guava can also indicate liberation. Of sadness, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of the dream of collecting guava from trees in a dream. Interpretation of the dream of collecting guava from trees in a dream. Collecting guava indicates calm and comfort, and God knows best. If a married man dreams of picking guava, this may indicate prosperity, and God Almighty is All-Knowing. title: What you do not know about Ibn Sirin's interpretation of seeing rain in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing rain in a dream for a single woman: Seeing rain in a dream for individuals or for others means a lot, and because it is a source of goodness in reality, we may find really good interpretations, but there are certain types of rain that may portend bad insight, and we call on them to pay attention and care, and in our topic today we will learn about their meanings. Different visions according to the variety of details. What is the interpretation of seeing rain in a dream for a single woman? When a girl sees rain in her dream and she is comfortable, and finds herself begging, then in reality she needs such a positive motivation, after a stage that is close and has a long duration, and her walk can cross under Rain is also a sign of a good arrival for her, and in any case, seeing it raining in her dream is evidence of the end of pain and sorrows, as long as the rain is light. But if the rain is audible and frightening knocking on the doors, it may be a sign of bad things happening to her, or mistakes that happened to them, She alone knows them, and in all cases the door to repentance is open. For everyone, and God does not want the repentant. Seeing a girl diligent in her studies and doing her best to obtain the final grades in the test, to fulfill the wishes of the parents and participate in their joy, indicates the satisfaction of her desire and the overwhelming joy that she and the whole family feel after viewing the result. In the case of the girl who finds... Difficulty finding the right person to marry her and not finding someone who meets all the conditions she set for her partner. Seeing rain falling from the sky and chattering on the window is evidence of this. This person will come soon, and he will quickly marry her to him. But if she hears the sound of thunder that precedes the rain and it is frightening, then she is suffering from anxiety about a specific matter, which may be related to exams or to her old age and the delay in her engagement, and this may be due to. She is looking for the appropriate job that is compatible with her field of study and finds it difficult to find it. It rains in a dream for an unmarried woman according to Ibn Sirin. Among the dreams whose interpretation scholars have not disputed, whether Nabulsi, Ibn Sirin, or other famous dream interpretation scholars, we find that the sayings focus on The crucible of goodness and blessing that the dreamer receives while it rains without harm. Ibn Sirin said that the rain in the dream of the Virgin Mary, who throughout her life enjoyed a good reputation and was known by those around her for her good morals and calm temperament, is good news for her that God Almighty, Almighty) will repay her patience with goodness, and she will be blessed with a good husband. The one you deserve, find happiness next to him, and create a happy family with him. It is based on the morals of religion and its tolerant principles. In the event that the dreamer is attached to someone, but finds it difficult to convince his parents, due to tightness of hand and his inability to meet the demands of the girl’s family, there are those who will interfere in the matter. , and the parents are convinced of the bright future of the young man, and that he condemns him and his engagement is an important reason for acceptance. It was also said that the girl will fall into a certain problem and its negative influence on her will end soon and she will gain peace of mind and peace of mind after suffering from many fears because of that during the previous period. The 50 most important interpretations of seeing rain in the

title: Interpretation of a dream about grapes in a dream for people of different colors.. The meaning of a dream about grapes

preview.html: Through an encyclopedia, we talk about the interpretation of seeing grapes in a dream for single people, because the science of dream interpretation is a gifted science and cannot be acquired, while it depends entirely on the strength of the interpreter’s intelligence. Consider the dreamer's situation... Grapes are considered one of the fruit vines. Cultivation began in ancient times and its leaves, seeds, and fruits were found. Grapes have many uses in everything that can be consumed or made as a type of juice. Aside from being used in jams, jellies, and vinegar, grapes come in many colors. And various forms, including red, green, black and yellow, and it is considered one of the richest fruits in antioxidants, regardless of its use as a source. Of the vitamins K and C that the body needs, as well as their role in reducing the risk of heart disease, dream interpreters saw that the appearance of grapes in a dream is one of the visions that bring goodness to a person. Interpretation of grapes in a dream for a single womanIt is possible that visions of grapes in a girl’s dream It indicates the extent of her generosity and love for others, so she does not hesitate to provide assistance to others if possible. Sudden visions of grapes also explain the appearance of problems in the girl’s life or her illness, but she quickly overcomes these difficulties and illnesses and her life becomes better than before. The unmarried woman who sees In her dream, a bunch of grapes may indicate that she is feeding herself with an inheritance from a relative, and she must do good and spend this money in places that deserve it. Interpretation of a dream about eating grapes for a single woman: Who among us does not like grape fruit, whether small or large? Because of its delicious taste, it is one of the fruits of Paradise, and seeing a girl in a dream that she is eating grapes has many interpretations according to the color of the grapes, as follows: Dream of eating green grapes. See I am eating green grapes in a dream. An unmarried girl has a sign of goodness and a sign of power and prestige, and that she will be blessed with marriage. From a young man who is prestige and handsome as well. A dream about eating black grapes: This vision could indicate that she will marry a man after a love story if it is at the right time, and seeing black grapes can indicate illness if it is not at the right time, and interpreters differ regarding this vision. Dream of eating white grapes: This vision is an indication that the man who wants to marry her will propose to the girl who is distinguished by a rich man who has prestige and a house, but is several years older than her. Dream of eating a bunch of red grapes. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is eating red grapes, this is a sign and warning from a man. He wants to marry her for his wife and have children. The vision may indicate success and excellence and that she will achieve what she wants or have a successful husband after a love story and their lives will be financially and emotionally stable and full of happiness. Interpretation of seeing red grapes in a dream for a single woman: Seeing red grapes in a dream for an unmarried woman It means that she will marry one of the good men who will love her very much. Seeing eating red grapes in an unmarried woman’s dream interprets that she will find a new job in which she will occupy a higher position than she has now, regardless of her source of livelihood. Seeing grapes

title: Interpretation of liver in a dream: Eating his liver in a dream

preview.html: Seeing liver for single people, for married people, for pregnant women, for divorced women, for men, raw and cooked liver, eating chicken and cow liver, cutting large raw liver, cooking liver according to Ibn Sirin and more. Liver in a dream is one of the dreams that carry for us many very important meanings, indications and interpretations, which make the dreamer feel confused. Extreme in its interpretation, as the liver is one of the basic and important tasks in public life, in order to reap many tremendous benefits from it. With health, as the dreamer sees that he is eating his liver in his dreams, which makes him feel very anxious and confused, but we must know that the dream brings a lot of goodness and happiness that the dreamer will have in the coming period, and it will give him a lot of money, and we will explain to you the correct interpretation of eating his liver in The dream as interpreted by the translator Ibn Sirin in his various interpretations. Interpretation of the liver in a dream Seeing a liver in a dream generally indicates money, knowledge, and children. Everything that affects the liver affects its owner. Seeing a liver in a dream, if it is large, means courage and compassion. If you dream that your liver is not working, This indicates that you will have to deal closely with people with a sharp nature. Seeing a liver in a dream is a sign of the appearance of buried money. Whoever dreams that his liver is very large, this indicates the great courage that he will bear in the coming period to face problems. And all the livers that appear, whether in Humans or animals, are buried money. If you dream that you are eating grilled liver, this is an indication that your partner will look at another woman. If you dream that your liver hurts, this indicates the abuse you bring to your child or your partner. Pain in the liver in a dream can symbolize the great anxiety that the dreamer will see in the coming period. In the event that the dreamer sees in a dream that his liver is injured, this indicates the large amount that he will suddenly earn. Seeing a wound in the liver is a sign of the boy’s death. If one dreams that he is eating liver, this It means that he must spend his saved money to get rid of problems and difficulties. And if he sees a face in his liver, as he sees it in the mirrors, this indicates death. Eating a liver in a dream is an indication of benefiting from the child. Seeing a liver in a dream can symbolize the children that the couple wants to have, and eating a liver is eating Money: If he sees that there are many livers, this indicates an abundance of money. Whoever sees that his liver is sick and in pain, he will not have mercy on his family or care for them. Whoever dreams of eating something from the liver, then it is an acquisition, and if cooking it is permissible, even if it is otherwise reprehensible. The stomach is interpreted in six ways. : Forbidden money, brokerage, hate speech, children, living and working, and perhaps it is a return from a calamity. Whoever sees weakness in his spleen indicates the waste of money, and as for weakness of the lungs, it indicates the nearness of his death. As for the lungs, it is a person’s joy and happiness. Whoever sees something that makes him happy or sad, interpret it. Whoever sees that his lung has been ruptured, his death is near and he may die sooner, because the lung is the seat of the soul. Interpretation of eating liver in a dream. Eating liver in a dream. Evidence that the dreamer is very brave

title: The meaning of seeing divorce in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of seeing divorce in a dream is a widely circulated title on the famous Google search site, because it is one of the most terrifying dreams for those who see it in a dream, and the first thing they search for is an interpretation of the meaning of divorce in a dream. The state of being unable to live together because Islam is a religion of mercy. However, divorce in a dream can leave pain in the dreamer’s soul, so people rush to know the interpretation of the dream for fear that this vision will come true. Separation is one of the most painful things in people’s souls. Divorce in a dream is worthy. Noting that dreams are a big world full of mystery and hidden messages that reach you in the form of symbols and events in the dream, and therefore we find that there is a special section on the science of dream interpretation that is taught in it. Universities, and we also find that there are major scholars who have specialized in dream interpretation since ancient times, such as the scholar Nabulsi, Ibn Sirin and others, and through our article today we will discuss with you the interpretation of the meaning of seeing divorce in a dream, and we will also discuss the opinions and interpretations of major scholars who interpret dreams. The meaning of seeing divorce in a dream. Every vision that comes to our dream, we always find that each of the events that come to us in a dream has a meaning and an interpretation. This event can indicate a stage in our life and it can also indicate something that will happen in the future. Through the following paragraph we discuss the opinions and interpretations of leading scholars on the meaning of divorce in a dream: The respected scholar Ibn Sirin says that divorce in general in a dream indicates separation and also shows... It does not have to be a human being, it can be a project, a school, an entity, or it can be a separation from a family, and so on. Some dream interpreters also say that it can indicate bad speech and refers to hateful speech that expresses the cruelty of a rude, cruel person. Heart. As for the Nabulsi scholar, he says: If he sees a divorce in a dream if he is not married, he will leave his situation, and this separation does not have to be bad, it can be good, such as leaving his life as a bachelor and entering it. Marital nest. As the scholar Al-Nabulsi says, if this person is married, this may indicate that there is a mistake in his life and he must reconsider. Interpretation of the meaning of seeing divorce in a dream for the patient. We discussed the interpretation of the meaning of divorce in a dream in general in the previous paragraph, and in the following lines we will discuss with you the interpretation Seeing divorce in a dream for a sick person: The scholar Al-Nabulsi indicates that if the dreamer is sick, then he dreams of divorce, then this indicates his death, and God knows best. As some scholars say: If a woman sees in her dream that her husband has divorced her, and the divorce was once, then this in reality indicates The harsh words between them and the disagreements between them all the time. As some scholars say: If the dreamer is a woman and she is pregnant, and she sees divorce in her dream, then this indicates the approaching date of her birth, then this indicates divorce, and God knows best. The meaning of seeing divorce in a dream for a single girl in the following lines We will talk with you about the interpretation of a dream about divorce for an unmarried girl: As for the unmarried girl, the
